name: Argonauts
quote: “Gee, the brochure said said the Seven Seas – nothing about giant monsters, supernatural horrors and legendary creatures living in those seas!”
abilities: Defense = the number of other Characters in your Movie. Maximum 7.
title: Thief

name: Big Dumb Farmer
quote: “Dude, ale me!”
abilities: Defense = +10 while in the “Truck Stop”.
title: Corsair

name: Cabin Boy
quote: “Good night, Westley. Good work. I’ll most likely kill you in the morning.”
abilities: Defense = 3 if in the same Movie as the Dashing Sea Captain.
title: Waves

name: Crazy Old Mariner
quote: “Albatross!”
abilities: 'Supernatural’ Attacks must target the Crazy Old Mariner before any other Character in the same Movie.
title: Avenge

name: Cutpurse
quote: “The way I look at it is I’m performing a public service. I’m teaching people how they shouldn’t carry their money.”
abilities: Once during your turn you may discard any number of cards from your hand and take a similar number of cards at random from any other player.
title: Buccaneer

name: Damsel in Distress
quote: “S’what’s so wrong wit being in dis dress anyway?”
abilities: Cannot be the victim of any Creatures while there are ‘Male’ Characters in the same Movie.
title: Island

name: Dashing Sea Captain
quote: “I’m in shipping and receiving… Mostly receiving.”
title: Revenge

name: Exotic Savage
quote: “My dear comrades, I put on my breeches just like you.”
abilities: The printed DS of any ‘Weapon’ is doubled when held by the Exotic Savage.
title: Catch

name: Heroic Babe
quote: “Think that’s tough? Try having a sword fight in a corset and 4 inch heels!”
abilities: For all purposes, treat the Heroic Babe’s printed DS as equal to the highest printed DS of any ‘Male’ Characters in the same Movie.
title: Danger

name: Lady In Waiting
quote: “Would you please hurry up? I am so sick of…”
abilities: Defense = 4 if in the same Movie as the “Noble Lady”.
title: Shark

name: Legendary Captain
quote: “Sin bad. Virtue good.”
abilities: Discard two cards from your hand to stop one ‘Aquatic’ Attack.
title: Chase

name: Masked Hero With a Way Too Thick Accent
quote: “We’ve lived here all our lives. How come he’s the only one with an accent?”
abilities: When you play Masked Hero you may take a ‘Swashbuckler Weapon’ Prop out of the discard pile and give it to him.
title: Master

name: Merry Outlaw
quote: “Fear not! These are my pleasure tights. If they were my killing tights, you’d be dead already.”
abilities: Defense = +6 in “Sherwood Forest.”
title: Blood

name: Musketeer
quote: “All for one and one for all!”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every other ‘Swashbuckler’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Sinbad

name: Musketeer in Training
quote: “All for one and two for tea… Wait I know this one!”
title: Seven

name: Noble Lady
quote: “The poor provide such good sport.”
abilities: While the Noble Lady is in your Movie, your maximum hand size is seven.
title: Slash

name: Noble Steed
quote: “A fine, noble beast.” “Yeah, as long as you’re not behind him.”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to give a ‘Swashbuckler’ Character +2 DS while it remains in play.
title: Queen

name: Noble Swordsman
quote: “Now that I’ve defeated you, I’m going to let you live, just to prove what a great guy I am.” “What an idiot, you mean.”
title: Privateer

name: Old Monk
quote: “Tuck you, buddy! And the mule you rode in on!”
abilities: Defense = 5 vs. ‘Supernatural’ Attacks.
title: Cutthroat

name: Parrot
quote: “Raawk! Pieces of eight! Walk the plank! Raawk!”
abilities: May be played as a Prop to give the “Dashing Sea Captain” +10 Defensive Strength. The Parrot may not use Props.
title: Return

name: Pet Monkey
quote: “We named the monkey ‘Jack.’”
abilities: Discard three cards from your hand to make the Pet Monkey steal a Prop from any Movie. The owner can prevent the theft by giving you two random cards from their hand. This ability may be used at anytime.
title: Cannon

name: Rakish Rogue
quote: “Eye Patches are very comfortable. I’m sure that in the future, everyone will be wearing them.”
abilities: Gains +1 Defensive Strength for every ‘Female’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Swashbuckler

name: Skippy the Wonder Sea-Dog
quote: “What ist that, Skippy? Thou thinkest villainy ist afoot?”
abilities: May not use Props.
title: Map

name: Tavern Wenches
quote: “Tipping me a doubloon will not get you into my pantaloons, you no account poltroon.”
abilities: Defense = 5 while in the “Wharfside Tavern”. Gives +1 Defensive Strength to all ‘Male, Swashbuckler’ Characters in the same Movie.
title: Storm

name: Buccaneers
quote: “Where do I keep my buccaneers? Under my buccan hat!”
abilities: Always succeeds on the “Caribbean Island”.
title: Shield

name: City Watch
quote: “For the right price we can watch for trouble… unless you don’t want us to, then it will cost you more.”
abilities: If successful, knock out up to two Characters instead of killing them. Knocked out Characters are DS = 0 and lose all special abilities until they regain consciousness at the start of their controller’s next turn.
title: Crusade

name: Corrupt Official
quote: “You! In my chambers at ten o’clock. You – 10:15!… and bring a friend.”
title: Skull

name: Deformed, Ruthless Nobleman
quote: “My childhood was typical. Locked in a tower for weeks at a time, and every Christmas my father would let me out to slaughter the fattest serf in the fiefdom.”
abilities: Always targets the weakest Character in a Movie. If there is a tie, Attacker can choose which to kill.
title: Mutiny

name: Evil Witches
quote: “When shall we three meet again?” “Let me check my date book.”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the AS of the current Attack and make it ‘Supernatural.’
title: Swordsman

name: Fire Ship
quote: “Oh, good. You can get lots of discounts…” “Fire SHIP! Fire SHIP!”
abilities: Always succeeds against the “Pirate Ship” and the “Naval Frigate.”
title: Secret

name: Ghost Sailors
quote: “Being dead has its privileges; we can do really cool stunts.”
abilities: May be combined with the “Phantom Vessel” or the “Ghost Ship.”
title: Treasure

name: Greedy Tax Collector
quote: “How else will the nobility eat?”
abilities: If the Tax Collector succeeds in an Attack, they steal the hand of the player instead of killing a Character.
title: Tale

name: Heartless Naval Officer
quote: “With a name like Captain Blood I doubt crew morale will be high on his list of priorities.”
abilities: Heartless Naval Officer can make ‘Aquatic’ Attacks. If he does, his AS = 20.
title: Zenda

name: Highwayman
quote: “Who’s carriage is this?” “Mine.” BLAM! “Who’s carriage is this?” “...Y-Yours??”
abilities: Gains triple the bonus from the “Flintlock”.
title: Castle

name: Island Savages
quote: “Their women aren’t wearing any clothes!” “That’s to draw your attention away from their spears, sir.”
title: Rose

name: Phantom Vessel
quote: “I’ve heard tales of a ghost ship that kills in its wake. No survivors.” “If there are no survivors, where do the stories come from?”
abilities: If the Attack fails, the target may choose to make the Phantom Vessel his new Location. It has DS +5 and the traits ‘Vehicle’ and ‘Aquatic.’ All cards that affect “Pirate Ship” or “Naval Frigate” will affect this Location as well.
title: Sailor

name: Re-interpreted Historical Figure Who Probably /Wasn’t As Evil As All This
quote: “To celebrate my birthday, let’s invite everyone from the surrounding villages to a feast… and poison them. Happy birthday to me, happy birthday to me…”
abilities: If successful, this Creature can either kill ALL normal Characters from the target Movie OR kill one Character who has been rendered unkillable by some other card effect.
title: Dead

name: Seductive Villainess
quote: “Kill them all… except for the handsome one. Have him bathed and taken to my chambers.”
abilities: If successful, the Seductive Villainess must target a ‘Female’ Character (if one is available).
title: Man

name: Shark-Infested Waters
quote: “Welcome to Shark Tooth Bay… Why don’t you stay for a bite?”
abilities: Gains +10 Attack Strength if played immediately after another Attack against the same Movie.
title: Ocean

name: Soldiers
quote: “Me mum sez ‘Join the army, it’ll build character’. Never said nuthin’ ‘bout the lousy pay, cramped quarters and disgusting food.” “What do you think ‘character’ is, mate?”
abilities: May be combined with any one of the following: “Heartless Naval Officer”, “Usurper to the Throne”, “Corrupt Official”, “Evil Cattle Barron”, “Evil Warlord”, “Lecherous Religious Official”, “Evil Grand Vizier” and “Seductive Villainness.”
title: Prisoner

name: Stop-Motion Mythological Beast
quote: “Move and shoot. Move and shoot. This battle’s going to take forever.”
title: Jolly Roger

name: Stop-Motion Plasticene Sea Serpent
quote: “Captain, the men and I are concerned that there’s been very… say, is that a tentacle?”
abilities: If successful, the Sea Serpent may destroy one ‘Aquatic Vehicle’ as well as killing a Character.
title: Nottingham

name: The Scurvy Musketeers of the Spanish Main
quote: “En garde, señor!”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost Attack Strength. Gain double the bonus from ‘Swashbuckler Weapons’.
title: Peril

name: Traitorous Musketeer
quote: “All for one and more for me.”
abilities: If the Traitorous Musketeer’s first Attack succeeds, he may immediately make a second Attack.
title: Cross

name: Usurper to The Throne
quote: “My brother! My brother! What did he ever do except get born first?”
abilities: Gains +2 AS for each card you discard from your hand.
title: Chest

name: Below Decks
quote: “Get down there and start rowing like your life depends on it… because it does!”
abilities: May be combined with any Location that is both ‘Aquatic’ and a ‘Vehicle.’
title: Iron

name: Caribbean Island
quote: “Sit on the beach and drink rum! Is that all you’re going to do?” “Welcome to the Caribbean, love.”
abilities: May be combined with any other Location that isn’t a proper noun (“Paris”, “Tokyo Skyline”, “English Channel” etc.).
title: Sherwood

name: Carriage
quote: “Champagne? In the middle of a chase?” “You’re right… Something red!”
abilities: May be combined with the “Country Road”.
title: Gang

name: Country Road
quote: “You stay in the carriage. Maybe that heavily armed man lying in the road is hurt and maybe he’s not.”
abilities: The “Highwayman” always succeeds on the Country Road.
title: Three

name: English Channel
quote: “One whole channel and there’s never anything to watch.”
abilities: May be combined with any Location that is both ‘Aquatic’ and a ‘Vehicle.’
title: Scoundrel

name: Gaol
quote: “The iron maiden and the gibbet are good devices. Don’t get me wrong, I just miss the good old days when we used to boil people in oil.”
title: Robin Hood

name: Monastery
quote: “Get thee to a monkery!”
abilities: Defense = +6 in a Movie with any of the following Characters: “Old Monk”, “Old Priest”, “Preacher Man”, “Reverend Minister” or “Helpful Cleric.”
title: Pirate

name: Naval Frigate
quote: “In the navy you can sail the seven seas…”
abilities: Printed Defense is doubled while in the “English Channel”.
title: Flash

name: Paris
quote: “You know what the problem with the French is? They don’t have a word for entrepreneur.”
title: Blade

name: Pirate Ship
quote: “We’re not pirates, we’re maritime entrepreneurs.”
abilities: Defense = -5 if attacked by a player who has the “Naval Frigate” in their Movie.
title: Steel

name: Sherwood Forest
quote: “Oh yeah? Well we’d be a whole lot merrier if we could actually sleep under a roof for a change!”
abilities: The “Corrupt Offical” may not Attack a Movie set in Sherwood Forest.
title: Captain

name: The Crow’s Nest
quote: “That sure is a long way down.” “Don’t fall.”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. ‘Swashbuckler’ Attacks. May be combined with any Location that has the traits ‘Aquatic’ and ‘Vehicle.’
title: Mask

name: The Gallows
quote: “Does the prisoner have a last request?” “Yes. Please don’t kill me.”
abilities: May be combined with the “Gaol”.
title: Adventure

name: Wharfside Tavern
quote: “Who’s in the mood for a rousing sea shanty?”
abilities: Anytime there are two or more Characters at the Wharfside Tavern, any player may discard four cards from their hand to start a brawl. The owner of the Wharfside Tavern must choose to discard one Character.
title: Dread

name: Big Floppy Hat
quote: “Well, it’s no Big Pointy Hat, but I guess it’ll do.”
abilities: Grants the Trait ‘Swashbuckler’ to whomever wears it.
title: Treasure

name: Cannon
quote: “Prepare to be cannonized, monsignior!”
abilities: Discard the Cannon from play to destroy the “Naval Frigate”, the “Pirate Ship” or the “Houseboat”.
title: Rapier

name: Cask of Grog
quote: “Excuse me, I have a grog in my throat.”
abilities: Discard the Cask of Grog from play to give all of your Characters +2 DS for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Ship

name: Chest of Gold
quote: “Don’t spend it all in one place.”
title: Sword

name: Corset
quote: “If this is the latest fashion on the Continent, then death by asphyxiation must be all the rage!”
abilities: Triple the printed Defensive Strength of any ‘Female’ Character who wears it.
title: Courageous

name: Cutlass
quote: “Don’t let the name fool you, it works just as well the chaps as it does on the lasses.”
title: Royal

name: Eye Patch
quote: “How’d you gt that?” “Rubbing my eyes in the morning… First day with the hook.”
abilities: May by played on an opponent’s Character. Defense = +10 on the “Dashing Sea Captain.”
title: High

name: Flintlock
quote: “Impressively loud, sure. But also impressively unreliable.”
abilities: When another player attacks your movie, you must discard a card from your hand or immediately lose the Flintlock, the Character holding it and any other cards attached to that Character.
title: Wench

name: Iron Mask
quote: “Yeah, yeah, you’re the real king and there’s an imposter on the throne… look buddy, if I had a franc for every time I’d heard that one…”
abilities: This Prop may be played on another player’s Character. DS = -10 in the “Gaol”, “Dungeon”, “The Big House” or the “Town Jail”.
title: Fearless

name: Long Bow
quote: “...off the weather vane atop the church, straight through a passing duck and into the bullseye.” “Not in a million…” “Blindfolded.” “That I have to see!”
abilities: Defense = +7 in the hands of the “Merry Outlaw”.
title: Rogue

name: Main Gauche
quote: “Main gauche goes in and blood gushes out. See how that works?”
abilities: Defense = +4 against all ‘Swashbuckler’ Attacks.
title: Guard

name: Powder Keg
quote: “One spark and its straight to Davey Jones’ Locker with all of us.”
abilities: Discard from play to add +15 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR discard from play to destroy one Location.
title: Sail.

name: Rapier
quote: “Sharp as my tongue and three times as long.”
title: Forest

name: Sabre
quote: “Nice sword. You got a dance to go with it?”
title: King

name: Scimitar
quote: “Dude, somebody bent your sword.”
abilities: If the Character wielding the Scimitar is killed or otherwise removed from play, the controlling player may immediately transfer it to another Character in the same Movie. The receiving Character must be able to use it.
title: Golden

name: Secret Letter
quote: “If I tell you what’s in it, it wouldn’t be a secret anymore.”
abilities: Place a card from your hand under this card. That card no longer count as being in your hand but may be played as though it were in your hand. If you ever use the card you may place a new card under here. If Secret Letter is ever removed from play, any card under it is immediately lost.
title: Duel

name: Snazzy Boots
quote: “Real leather, pure silver buckles. Can you believe the cobbler let me have them for 15 florins? It’s amazing what a bargaining chip a loaded pistol makes.”
abilities: Defense = +5 on any ‘Swashbuckler’ Character.
title: Steal

name: Treasure Map
quote: “I tell the tourists it’s inked in blood and written on human skin. You wouldn’t believe how many I sell in a week.”
abilities: Discard the Treasure Map from play to take one non-’Vehicle’ Location or ‘Treasure’ card from any Movie or the discard pile and put it into your Movie.
title: Sea

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Well, the gold’s all buried, so it must be over.”
title: Scarlet

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Well our duty’s been fulfilled and the King’s still alive, so I guess it’s over.”
title: Musketeer

name: Belay That Order!
quote: “Stand down, Mister!”
abilities: Stop one card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played. That card goes to the discard pile with no effect.
title: Lady

name: Big Fight Scene in the King’s Banquet Hall
quote: “Get me every warm body we have on the lot… Even the extras!”
abilities: Triple the AS of the current Attack and give it the trait ‘Swarm.’
title: Master

name: Boarding Party
quote: “It’s our party and we’ll kill if we want to.”
abilities: Double the AS of the current Attack. Triple it and give it the Trait ‘Swarm’ if the Location being attacked is the “Pirate Ship”, the “Naval Frigate” or the Houseboat.
title: Caribbean

name: Booty
quote: “Woot!”
abilities: Play any time (except during an Attack) to take a free turn immediately. If played during another player’s turn, play resumes with that player when your free turn is done. You may not “Roll the Credits” on your free turn. Each player may play Booty only one per game.
title: Scurvy

name: Buried Treasure
quote: “Hey Captain, some of the boys and I were thinking, this time, instead of burying it, why don’t we spend the gold?”
abilities: Take any five cards out of the discard pile and put them into your hand. No played may play Buried Treasure more than once in a single game.
title: Far

name: Cannon Barrage
quote: “A most extraordinary thing. I find myself being fired upon by an entire ship!”
abilities: Destroy one Location. For every card you discard from your hand along with Cannon Barrage, you may kill one Character at that Location.
title: Commander

name: Craft Services
quote: “Another sumptuous banquet… Hey are those Zoodles?”
abilities: Draw a card from the deck for each Character you have in your Movie. The “Documentary Cameraman” cannot use his special ability on this card.
title: Barbary

name: Daring Escape
quote: “All we have to do is grab a vine and swing across this chasm… carrying the girl… and the treasure… on horseback.”
abilities: Take one Character from the discard pile for each player in the game. Give one Character to each player. If there aren’t enough Characters then give on to as many players as possible.
title: Great

name: Dated Special Effects
quote: “This newfangled technology ain’t better: it takes longer to do and costs more.”
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one Attack with “Stop-Motion” in its name.
title: Dungeon

name: Disarm
quote: “You mean I was only supposed to knock the weapon out of his hand… Well, on the plus side, he’s not fighting back anymore.”
abilities: Steal the hand of the player of your choice. Keep any cards you like and discard the rest.
title: Sir

name: Doubloons
quote: “Money makes everything all right.”
abilities: Stop a card (except for “Roll the Credits”) from being played and put it into your hand instead of the discard pile.
title: White

name: Equal Shares
quote: “One for you, one for me. Two for you, one, two for me. Three for you…”
abilities: Starting with the play who plays this and going clockwise, each player may choose to take a card from the discard pile into their hand or draw 3 cards from the deck. Equal Shares can only played once per game.
title: Monkey

name: Fire at Will
quote: “Which one of ‘em’s Will?”
abilities: Add +10 Defensive Strength for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Long John

name: Hurricane
quote: “Why are hurricanes named after women?” “You’ve never had to deal with an angry ex-wife have you?”
abilities: Destroy one Location. If it has the trait ‘Aquatic’, you may also kill a Character who is there.
title: Heart

name: I Am Not Left Handed
quote: “Why are you smiling?”
abilities: Give one Character +2 DS and the Trait ‘Swashbuckler’ for as long as that Character remains in play.
title: Crimson

name: In Times of War
quote: “This war is worse than Hell itself.” “You have a very optimistic view of Hell.”
abilities: All Attacks made until the end of your next turn are made at double their printed Attack Strength.
title: Tortuga

name: Keel Hauling
quote: “We call it that because it never fails to keel ya dead.”
abilities: Kill one Character from any Movie.
title: Side

name: King’s Ransom
quote: “Maybe we should have kidnapped a king from a bigger country.” “Why? What did we get.” “$17 and a gold ashtray.”
abilities: Draw two cards. “Documentary Cameraman” cannot use his ability on this card.
title: Prison

name: La Botta Secretta
quote: “The secret move of the school against against which there is no defense.” “Like a kick in the groin?” “Yes, like a kick in the groin.”
abilities: Play this card during an Attack and you decide which side wins. If this card doesn’t get canceled, no other SFX cards may be played until the Attack is fully resolved.
title: Legend

name: Marooned
quote: “Shall I give you the tour? There’s the ocean, there’s the beach and there’s the palm tree. That pretty much sums it up.”
abilities: Take any number of Characters from one Movie (so long as their printed DS does not exceed 5) and set them aside. They are no longer part of their owner’s Movie. Their owner may only get them back by having a card in play that is both ‘Aquatic’ and a ‘Vehicle’ and discarding two cards from hand for each Character they wish to rescue.
title: World

name: More Than You Bargained For
quote: “Who are you and what did you do with the REAL Prince Philipe Ronaldo Eduardo di Castillo de la Montegna de la Bamba?”
abilities: Swap one of your Characters (including all attached cards) for any other Character in play.
title: Gold

name: Never Bring a Sword to a Gun Fight
quote: “Hey Pierre, what’s that little bitty sword going to do to me from all the way over there?” WHOOSH, THUD! “Who knew you could throw a sword?”
abilities: Give any Prop +5 DS and the Traits ‘Weapon’ and ‘Swashbuckler’ for as long as it remains in play.
title: Ghost.

name: Parry
quote: “Blocking your opponent’s sword with your sword is a good tactic but blocking it with another opponent is even better.”
abilities: Stop one card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played.
title: Phantom

name: Peg Leg
quote: “It even has a secret compartment. I keep my keys in there so I won’t lose them.”
abilities: Play to stop any Character from being killed or otherwise removed from play. The Character loses -2 DS for as long as they remove in play.
title: Infamous

name: Protect the King
quote: “I’d rather protect the Queen. She’s a babe.” “Shut up and do your job!”
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one Attack if you have the “Musketeer” or the “Musketeer in Training” in your Movie.
title: Pearl

name: Romantic Subplot
quote: “Is this a kissing movie?”
abilities: Designate a ‘Male’ and a ‘Female’ Character in your Movie as lovers. Should one die, you may sacrifice the other to take up to six cards from the hand of the player responsible.
title: Silver

name: Scurvy
quote: “How else can you get people to eat lime?”
abilities: Remove one Character from play. You cannot play this against a player with “Exotic Tropical Fruit” in their Movie.
title: Death

name: Set Sail!
quote: “Bon voyage!”
abilities: Add +3 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one Attack against a Movie that has the “Pirate Ship” or “Naval Frigate”.
title: Isle

name: Silent Movie
quote: “Shhhh!”
abilities: The player of your choice may not speak or make any vocal sounds until the end of your next turn. If they do, you may take either their entire hand or the Character of your choice. They are allowed to communicate through gesture and may play cards. Other players MUST interpret their played cards honestly.
title: Marquis

name: Stand and Deliver!
quote: “Hand over all your lupins!”
abilities: Force the player of your choice to miss their next turn.
title: Lord

name: Stunt Double
quote: “First you swing on the rope, through the flames, dodging cannon fire…” “You mean Larry swings on the rope, through the flames…”
abilities: Prevent one Character from being removed from play for any reason.
title: Evil

name: Swing from the Chandelier!
quote: “Look at me, I’m a ceiling fan!”
abilities: Double a Movie’s Defensive Strength for the duration of the current attack OR stop one ‘Swashbuckler’ attack.
title: Lion

name: Taken Prisoner
quote: “Nice jail you have here. All dark and impenetrable-like.”
abilities: Play after a successful Attack. Instead of being discarded, the victim(s) of the Attack are added to the Attacker’s Movie.
title: Red

name: Taking on the Mantle
quote: “What is that, señor?” “That is a “Z”!” “Looks like a “2” to me”
abilities: Take one Character out of the discard pile and place it in your Movie. Its Defense is 2 less than its printed Defense.
title: Hawk

name: The Enemy of My Enemy
quote: “…means I’m outnumbered!”
abilities: You may combine any number of Creatures in your hand to make on Attack. The Attack gains +2 AS for each Trait ALL the cards have in common.
title: Schooner

name: To The Pain!
quote: “I don’t believe I’m familiar with that expression…”
abilities: Pick any two characters (from different Movies) to duel, Neither one needs to have the trait ‘Swashbuckler.’ Compare their Defensive Strength (including Props and other attached cards, but not Locations). The lower Character loses and its Defensive Strength is reduced to 0 for as long as it remains in play. SFX which boost either Defensive Strength or Attack Strength may be played to boost either Character (Trait restrictions still apply).
title: Count

name: Traditional Island Greeting
quote: “If they’re just coming to say hello, what’s with all the spears?”
abilities: Triple the AS of the current Attack and give it the trait ‘Native.’
title: Curse

name: Treason
quote: “I hope you’re ready for a short drop and a sharp stop.”
abilities: You may choose one Character in a player’s Movie. That Character can either Attack that Movie immediately (using its DS as AS) or you may discard that Character from play.
title: Warrior

name: Under Cover of Darkness
quote: “It’s so dark I can’t tell friend from foe. In fact, I don’t know which one you are. GAK!! So, foe it is…”
abilities: Double the Attack Strength of the current Attack
title: Coast

name: Walk the Plank
quote: “Excuse me, but this plank doesn’t seem to go anywhere…”
abilities: Kill one Character. If they were on either the “Naval Frigate” or the “Pirate Ship”, you immediately bank 5 points.
title: Brave

name: You’ve Not Seen the Last of Me!
quote: “I come back with a vengeance in Scene 126.”
abilities: Take a Creature from the discard pile and use it to make an Attack at double the printed AS.
title: Black
